result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Ineligible Voting Notice & Acknowledgment
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief
Mai Khou Vang

Case called: 11:26am. INCLUDES 14CF398, 14CF575, 14CF794. Clerk: Denise. State appears by ADA Kerri Puig. Defendant appears in custody and by Atty Dan Cveykus. Interpreter, Mai Khou Yang sworn & interprets. Crt finds interpreter qualified to interpret. Atty Cveykus states Waiver of Prelim needs to be done on 14CF575. Crt conducts colloquy of Waiver of Prelim with Defendant. Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made. Crt proceeds with the Plea. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to DRI 14CF794- crt grants. State moves to DRI ct 2 (poss drug para/party to) 14CF398- crt grants. State moves to DRI ct 1 (poss w/intent/party to); ct 2 (maintain drug traffic/party to); ct 4 (poss drug para/party to) 14CF575- crt grants.  PLEA: NO CONTEST - ct 1 (poss meth/party to crime) 14CF398; ct 3 (bj/felony) 14CF575. Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  COURT ORDERS: 4 months MCJ on each count, concurrent to each other; w/huber if eligible for work, school or treatment; no objection to EMP; 82 days creidt; Court Costs; DNA Surcharge. Crt informs and defendant signs Ineligible Voting Form. Crt addresses BFH remaining. Atty Cveykus makes statement. COURT vacates all Bond Forfeitures outstanding. Atty Cveykus makes statement re: $2,200 confiscated by law enforcement in 14CF575 - crt grants. Atty Cveykus to prepare an Order. Adjourned: 11:44am.
Defendan'ts Motion to Return of Property - includes 14CF398, 14CF575, 14CF794 - stj
Defendant's Motion for Reduction of Bail - includes 14CF398, 14CF575, 14CF794 - stj
Final pre-trial on January 15, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Final pretrial set

INCLUDES 14CF398, 14CF575, & 14CF794 Absolute sobriety. Contact Attic Correctional Services at 715-848-3202 for Day report.  No contact with victim(s): F.V. 
Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
org. warrant returned from Sheriff's dept.

Case called: 1:43pm. INCLUDES 14CF398, 14CF575, 14CF794. Clerk: Denise. State appears by ADA Lesli Pluster for ADA Kerri Puig. Defendant does not appear for BFH. Atty Dan Cveykus appears for BFH. Crt addresses defendant's apppearance. Atty Cveykus states the lack of contact with client and moves to withdraw. COURT holds open Bond Forfeiture and does not allow withdrawal of counsel at this time. BW to continue. Adjourned: 1:47pm.

Case called: 10:39am. INCLUDES 14CF398, 14CF575, 14CF794. State appears by ADA Kerri Puig. Defendant does not appear for Arraignment.  Atty Dan Cveykus appears for Defendant. Interpreter, Mai Khou Yang appears. Matter set for Arraignment. State moves for BW & BFH. Atty Cveykus makes statement regarding last contact with Defendant. Crt fofeits bond & sets BFH 10/16/14 @ 1:30pm BR 5. Clerk sends notice. Crt orders BW Body Only. Adjourned: 10:40am.
Mai Khou Yang
